title: Interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a small kangaroo? It indicates the ambition that the dreamer will achieve with his efforts and patience to reach it. What does a kangaroo attack mean? To a married woman in a dream? Remember some who are trying to tarnish her reputation. What is the interpretation of seeing a white kangaroo? The dream indicates good luck. What does fear of seeing a kangaroo mean? It indicates the dreamer's fear for his family and future. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream about seeing a kangaroo in a dream Proof that the dreamer is on the right path. Dreaming of a kangaroo refers to a man who loves his wife and children very much. A kangaroo in general in a dream about a kangaroo is an indication of the dreamer's strength and courage. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream also indicates that the dreamer is a very ambitious person. A kangaroo in a dream indicates getting rid of enemies. Seeing a kangaroo in a dream for Nabulsi Seeing a kangaroo being killed in a dream means that the dreamer is a very bad person and is on the path to guidance. A dream about seeing a kangaroo indicates the dreamer's courage, and this is what Nabulsi agreed on with Ibn Sirin. Seeing someone attacking a kangaroo is evidence of the problems he suffers from. Seeing a small kangaroo in a dream for a woman Single A small kangaroo expresses the girl's desire to marry and start a family. The vision indicates the ambition that the dreamer will achieve with his efforts and patience to reach it. The vision symbolizes the girl's greatness, intelligence and strength. See the point Kangaroo Good planning for future success and reaching a high position in society. The vision shows the girl's need for someone to provide her with support and protection. His vision also symbolizes the girl's knowledge that she is a compassionate person who helps others and loves them well. If he sees an unmarried person Chasing a kangaroo in a dream indicates a feeling of anxiety and fear of the future. Then it indicates that he is dealing with problems that cause anxiety in the girl and make her anxious and unable to make a decision. Chasing him in a dream expresses the harassment that the girl is exposed to at work at this time. A kangaroo bite in a dream symbolizes the need for a period of calm and stability. Interpretation of seeing a kangaroo in a dream for a married woman Seeing a kangaroo It indicates the kindness and love that a woman has for her family. The dream shows the love and respect that the husband has for her, in addition to his appreciation for the care she provides for his children. His vision also suggests aspirations and dreams that will come true soon. His vision Jumping means that he makes good decisions for her and her family. It also expresses overcoming the difficult stage and crises with all intelligence. Kangaroo attack For a married woman in a dream, this shows some people trying to tarnish her reputation. The vision warns that you will be hurt and fall into something hateful because of others. The vision also symbolizes wrong decisions that will negatively affect her life. Seeing a small kangaroo in a dream means pregnancy and childbirth, then expresses serious efforts to maintain the cohesion and strength of the family. Seeing a white kangaroo in a dream indicates seeing a white kangaroo in a dream for good luck. It also indicates physical comfort and raising morale. The vision symbolizes an unexpected joyful surprise. Seeing a red kangaroo indicates a woman's desire to sacrifice herself for her children. Visions

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a teacher in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a teacher in a dream A teacher in a dream is one of the dreams that we constantly see in our dreams, especially if the person is studying or a student, by constantly thinking about his teacher in the classroom and what he is doing that will get him through the school day or exams, and seeing the teacher in our dreams has different forms And important meanings that the person who dreams must know completely. The teacher is one of the very important jobs in all societies and also a special job and an important entity. The teacher's duty is important in raising and educating many generations that benefit society. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqSeeing a teacher calling your name in a dream is evidence of family problems that she will face soon. Seeing the individual taught by her teacher in a dream is evidence that she will get Degrees in life. Seeing a woman in your dream is evidence that you will become important. Seeing a girl teaching children in a dream is a sign that she will be proud of people. Teaching children in a dream is a sign of goodness for the next person. Single people communicate with her former teacher in a dream, Which indicates that she will get high grades in her studies. A married woman seeing her teacher in a dream is a sign of marital problems that will end. Seeing a married mathematics teacher before she dreams of her is a sign that problems will soon be eliminated. A married woman’s conversation with her teacher in a dream is evidence However, she will face problems in her life. Talking with a teacher in a dream is a sign that the dreamer has put an end to the problems. Seeing a teacher in a married woman’s dream is evidence that she will improve the education of her children. For a married woman to see her former teacher is evidence of her goodness in the future. Interpretation of seeing a teacher In a dream for a single woman: Everyone who was single and whose former teacher dreamed of seeing him and communicating with him was a sign of a relationship and higher academic results. If a single woman dreams that her teacher is yelling at her, this is evidence of some family problems that make her avoid confrontation. Everyone who saw her teacher teaching some things was... A sign that she will become a great person and will reach the highest academic levels. If a girl considers herself a teacher and teaches children, this is a sign and a sign of pride, and, God willing, she will become a prominent figure in society. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream for a married woman. A teacher dreaming of a married woman indicates that she will improve in Educating and raising her children, yes, education and morals, and her children will become important figures in society. And everyone who saw the teacher in her dream made it clear to her that she would face some marital problems, but she would quickly get rid of them and solve them as quickly as possible. If a married woman saw her teacher in her dream and talked to him, This indicates that she will overcome some of the problems she was facing and it will end according to the will of God Almighty. Also, seeing a married woman as a teacher in a dream means that she will receive a lot of advice from the person she enjoys a strong and influential personality in her life, and she also trusts him. Interpretation of seeing a teacher in a dream Of

title: Interpretation of a dream about demolishing a house

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about demolishing a house: To provide everything you are looking for, we will show you through this report the interpretation of seeing a demolished house in a dream, which Muhammad Ibn Shirin considers a sign that brings goodness to the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a demolished house in a dream: Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees himself demolishing part of the house or the whole house, then this Evidence of the presence of good and abundant money on the way to the dreamer in the coming season, and it was considered the demolition of a house in a dream. A good omen. Ibn Sirin said: Whoever sees himself demolishing someone else’s house is evidence that he took money from demolishing his house, and if he sees himself demolishing only part of that house, it means that he takes money from that person. Freeing him from debt or taking him out of the house. The collapse of the house in flood waters is evidence of the death of the family members. As for the abandoned house in the dream, it is evidence of the dreamer’s negligence and failure to mention any details. This thing has serious consequences for the dreamer in the future. Seeing an abandoned house after it has been demolished is a warning to the dreamer that there are those who are pursuing him and seeking to harm him. There is another interpretation of seeing the abandoned house and enjoying life. Interpretation of demolishing a house in a dream. As for whoever sees himself demolishing the wall of a house in a dream, this is It indicates that he has a strong personality that can overcome all the difficulties and problems he faces in life and is a sign that he will gain great status and status. The situation at a later time. Whoever sees in a dream that one of the walls of his house has been damaged, this indicates that there are many problems and fears in his house, but it is a sign that he will be able to overcome these crises in the future. As for seeing the wall of the house collapsing completely without harming any of the members Family, this is a sign of a lot of happy news in the coming days, compensation for the worries and sorrow that it suffered during the previous period. The financial crises that he is going through, which is a sign and warning to him against wasting money in the future. As for whoever sees that the building that he already owns or his own building has been demolished or part of it was demolished, this is evidence of the death of a member of his family or someone close to him and that the dreamer will suffer from Worry, sadness and depression. The coming period. Whoever sees in a dream that his house falls on his head, this is a sign of alleviating his distress and finding treasure in reality because life with him is difficult. Anyone who sees his house being demolished indicates that he will have many opportunities that he did not take advantage of. Interpretation of a dream of demolishing a house in a dream for a single or married woman: It is said that seeing the ceiling of her room falling or collapsing is a sign that she will soon have more money or that she will get a job, but If the ceiling of the room only falls on her, this indicates that she suffers from loneliness and that she suffers from depression and despair, and seeing the house completely destroyed is evidence of the death of the head of the family. As for the dream of demolishing the house for a married woman, it is an indication of the great change that will occur in her life and will transform it for the better. Seeing the roof of the house falling on her is evidence of the death of her husband and the breadwinner of her family. In the end, we hope that we have provided you with everything you are looking for about the interpretation of a dream about demolishing a house in a dream.

Seeing the roof of the house falling on her is evidence of the death of her husband and the breadwinner of her family. title: The most accurate interpretations of seeing a sheikh in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the presence of a sheikh in a dream: Seeing righteous elderly people in a dream has many clues, most of which relate to the roles of these righteous sheikhs in real life. They are preachers, people of wisdom, and scholars, and sheikhs and preachers are the heirs of the prophets in knowledge and communication. If an sheikh speaks in a dream, it may be a message from God. What is the interpretation of seeing an sheikh in a dream? If the dreamer sees that he is talking to an sheikh, this may indicate a warning against committing sins and staying away. About God. But if he sees that an old man is giving him water to drink, this indicates that the dreamer has fear of God. If the old man in a dream gives him something that indicates kindness, such as milk, this may indicate the kindness of the heart of the one who sees it. If a married woman sees an old man in In her dream, this may indicate happy news that the dream will bring her stability in her family life. If the dreamer sees an sheikh wearing white clothes, this may indicate the presence of someone who advises and guides him, and the presence of the sheikh in general in the dream may mean patience, knowledge, and good deeds. Ibn Sirin interprets Seeing an old man in a dream may indicate the desire of the dreamer to gain knowledge of religion and benefit from his knowledge, and it may also indicate the disappearance of a misfortune that was about to happen or is already occurring. An accident. Whoever sees himself in a dream that he is kissing an old man, this may indicate the good reputation of the dreamer among the people, but whoever sees that the old man cannot transfer his knowledge to people, this may indicate inconvenience in the form of illness or otherwise. What is the interpretation of seeing Sheikh Saleh in a dream? If the dreamer sees a righteous Sheikh, this may indicate that the possessor of knowledge will raise his status among his people, and that he will be among those who learn knowledge and benefit from it. In the dream there is wisdom and patience in the face of calamity. The good old man who speaks to the dreamer in the dream is a preacher trying to dissuade him from committing sins, repenting, and returning to God. If the dreamer accepts this good old man, this may be a message that people who want to harm him will not succeed and that God’s care will take him and protect him. If the dreamer is a woman and she sees that she is receiving a noble sheikh, this may indicate good behavior among people and a measure of piety. What is the interpretation of seeing a preacher in a dream? Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a preacher in a dream as that it may indicate the dreamer’s closeness to God, his love of obedience, and his efforts to reach the closest and most accurate understanding of true religion. Closer to what is logical. If he sits with the preacher in his circle of knowledge, it may indicate the abundance of goodness and people benefiting from him with knowledge, and this money may be on its way to him. According to what Imam Ibn Shaheen said about seeing the preacher in a dream, whoever sees the preacher wearing white clothes, The dreamer is one of the angels, and if the preacher has a white beard with thick hair, then he is one of the angels. A message from God. If he sees that someone who is praying gives him some water, then the dreamer can reach a high position. What is the interpretation of seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream? Seeing Sheikh Al-Shaarawi in a dream is considered a sign of kindness and means that the owner

title: Interpretation of the rosary in a dream. The meaning of the rosary in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the rosary, whether white, black, green, blue, or colored, or interrupting or praising God after prayer or in the mosque, for single women, for married women, for pregnant women, according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the rosary in a dream. Rosary: ​​a sign of a righteous woman, or a living person, or the military who will benefit from her kingdom. If you are Dreaming of a rosary, this foretells that people in high positions will show interest in you. If you count the rosary beads, this portends contentment and pure joy. If you arrange the rosary on a string, you will gain the favor of the rich. If you scatter the rosary, this symbolizes losing the attention of your acquaintances. And the rosary in the dream is a wife Fair, or a lawful life, or beneficial soldiers to whoever owns or glorifies it. If someone gives you a rosary in your dream, know that he will provide you with a good wife if you are not married, and if you are married, know that he will help you in a job that will make you lawful money. Who dreams of wearing a rosary On his hand, this is evidence that he will provide a fair wife, a legitimate source of livelihood, or a useful army for whoever owns it or glorifies it. And whoever sees that he is waving a rosary in his hand, he will live a good life, as this dream indicates that its owner or whoever wears it will benefit from something. Interpretation of a dream The rosary by Ibn Sirin: The rosary in a dream is a fair and honorable woman, and she is the loyal wife of the one who sees her and it means a good and peaceful life. Whoever swims with it in a dream will obtain fruitful years of livelihood, and whoever buys it. He marries a virgin or gives birth to a girl, and whoever gives it benefits and guides its owner, and whoever takes it is a gift brought to him from a world in which there is good. Whoever loses it in his sleep, or has his rosary stolen, or sells it, has lost one of his loved ones. Interpretation of the rosary in a single woman’s dream: The rosary in one dream is a world full of gifts. It is a sign of her obedience to her Lord and a sign of her purity. The white rosary indicates a dream marriage, the blue rosary indicates success and progress, the green rosary indicates goodness of religion and ideal morals, and can indicate prayer or martyrdom, and the rosary in her hand is good, and means safety and security, and whoever dreams of someone giving her a gift or giving her a black rosary is a sign On a blessed and lasting marriage.Interpretation of the rosary in a married woman’s dream. The rosary in a married woman’s dream means a good life, or a world full of joy. A married woman who sees in her dream that her husband gives her a white rosary, then she will be pregnant, and the blue rosary. In a dream, money and livelihood, and the green rosary in a dream represents the purity of her daughters and her good upbringing of them, and the rosary in general in a married woman’s dream is safe and prosperous, and it means a successful marital relationship, and it is also an indicator of livelihood and wealth, and God knows best. Interpretation of the rosary in a pregnant woman’s dreamThe rosary appears in a dream A pregnant woman or symbolizes a newborn, and seeing her in a dream indicates a desire in the mind that will be fulfilled, and the rosary in a pregnant woman’s dream is like other women. Good luck or happiness.Interpretation of the green rosary in a dreamThe green rosary symbolizes good deeds or sincere worship, and is said to be close to God. Whoever buys it in a dream will buy the afterlife with his work and prayers, and whoever loses it

The white rosary indicates a dream marriage, the blue rosary indicates success and progress, the green rosary indicates goodness of religion and ideal morals, and can indicate prayer or martyrdom, and the rosary in her hand is good, and means safety and security, and whoever dreams of someone giving her a gift or giving her a black rosary is a sign On a blessed and lasting marriage.Interpretation of the rosary in a married woman’s dream. The rosary in a married woman’s dream means a good life, or a world full of joy. A married woman who sees in her dream that her husband gives her a white rosary, then she will be pregnant, and the blue rosary. In a dream, money and livelihood, and the green rosary in a dream represents the purity of her daughters and her good upbringing of them, and the rosary in general in a married woman’s dream is safe and prosperous, and it means a successful marital relationship, and it is also an indicator of livelihood and wealth, and God knows best. Interpretation of the rosary in a pregnant woman’s dreamThe rosary appears in a dream A pregnant woman or symbolizes a newborn, and seeing her in a dream indicates a desire in the mind that will be fulfilled, and the rosary in a pregnant woman’s dream is like other women. Good luck or happiness.Interpretation of the green rosary in a dreamThe green rosary symbolizes good deeds or sincere worship, and is said to be close to God. Whoever buys it in a dream will buy the afterlife with his work and prayers, and whoever loses it

title: Interpretation of seeing stones in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the collection of stones in a dream: Seeing moving stones in a dream indicates false testimony and slander in many colors for the person in dealing with people. As for if the dreamer sees that he is throwing stones at the house of an infidel, this indicates a call to the people of that house. Likewise, seeing a stone from a catapult indicates the cruelty of the recipient in the dream. I saw myself throwing stones from a high place. The dream symbolizes oppression and injustice. Also, picking up stones from the ground in a dream indicates resistance and continuous struggle. Picking up stones from the ground symbolizes overcoming difficulties in reality and obstacles faced by the dreamer. I saw you in a dream. Stones falling from my hand. The vision symbolizes weakness, weakness, and humor. The stone in the dream refers to the disobedient and cruel son to his parents. Throwing stones in a dream means submitting to injustice and tyranny. Since the stone thrown by women is a sign of rebellion and heresy in religion, may God forgive us and you. Interpretation of a white stone in a dream The white stone in a dream is a symbol of good luck for its bearer and the good life that the dreamer lives. Related to the stone The white color in the dream indicates the dreamer's longevity or symbolizes a fair woman in reality. Seeing many white stones in a country in a dream indicates the cheap prices of goods and products in this country. But if the dreamer is in a high position and sees the white stone in the dream, this is a sign of his remaining in this position for a long time. Seeing the white stone in a dream and hitting it and water coming out of it, the vision symbolizes the acquisition of many goods And the doors of livelihood for the dreamer. As for transporting stones in a dream to the dreamer, this indicates the many difficulties and problems that he is going through in his life. I saw in a dream a statue of a white stone, and this symbolizes the good deeds in his life and many good deeds and extending a helping hand to people. But if the dreamer sees him walking on many white stones in a dream, this indicates the great suffering that he is going through in his real life. Carrying stones in large quantities, some of which are white and silver in color, and this is good news of recovery from illness, and God knows best. Interpretation of walking on stones in a dream for a single woman A stone in a dream A single girl indicates approaching a person of high status and high status and will marry her. As for seeing a stone in a dream and water coming out of it, it is a sign of food, kindness and a lot of money after adversity. Seeing small stones in a dream is a group of money, and you will get it all at once. Walking on a stone for an unmarried girl in a dream indicates the difficult tasks that this girl has to do. A dream of someone flying Unrelated Small pebbles in a dream symbolize hypocrisy and envy. I saw in a dream that a stranger was throwing stones, which indicates courage and strength And her escape from trying to fall into it. As for collecting small pebbles in a dream, it symbolizes getting rid of plagues and sins, not committing sins and the extent of one’s closeness to the Creator. But if a person sees that throwing pebbles, this is evidence of the cunning and deception of the people closest to her. Exactly like

preview.html: Stealing food in a dream. Many people search for an interpretation of stealing food in a dream. Stealing food in a dream is one of the dreams that many people see and do not know the good and evil in this vision, especially since stealing food in reality is considered a disgrace, but it is certain that this vision has Meaning, and many interpretations differ depending on the state of the fortuneteller, so in this article we will show you the interpretation of stealing food in a dream, on the website.Various.Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of stealing foodSeeing stolen food in a dream is considered an unpleasant vision, because it indicates the presence of a large number of Enemies in the dreamer’s life. The interpretation of stealing food in a dream, according to the narration of the scholar Ibn Sirin, indicates the occurrence of many problems and misunderstandings with the family. Also, if there is a person known for stealing food in a dream, it may be. It indicates that he distorts the dreamer and speaks wrongly about him in reality. Seeing a man stealing food in a dream means that he will get what he wants and desires, but after many difficulties. And when we see in a dream an unknown person stealing food from the house, it may be a sign of a close marriage. In the fortuneteller’s house. If one sees that he is stealing food in a dream, this means that he has achieved his ambitions, but he needs patience and strong determination, especially since he will face many difficulties. When an unknown person steals food from your house, this means his entry into the dreamer’s house through his marriage Or the marriage of a family member. If someone sees in a dream that he is doing a bad job, for example, he is doing a bad job such as stealing, this means that in the dreamer’s life there are untrustworthy people, and the interpretation of stealing food in a dream indicates that he will fall. The dreamer of the evil that one of his relatives will do for him. Also, stealing in a dream shows the deception of some people. Whoever sees a familiar person stealing it in his dream, this means that this person will return and speak ill of him. If you see in a dream someone stealing your house or stealing your money, this It means that this person will marry into your family or one of your relatives and the person who steals from you will be your teacher and guide you. It is advised that the person who steals will be your horse, donkey, or any other animal who is the reason for your trip or you will travel with him. Whoever stole your clothes is the reason for your marriage, and whoever stole your furniture blames you for what you did, and whoever stole your wife’s gold will benefit you, and whoever stole your keys will delay and disrupt your goal. Success. Interpretation of stealing food in a dream for a single woman. If a single woman sees food being stolen in a dream, this may mean missing opportunities due to bad decisions. As for an unmarried woman who dreams of stealing food, it means bonding and a close marriage with the right person. The dream of seeing a woman An unmarried woman stealing food from home is evidence that she will hear a lot of good news and many happy events related to her. The dream interpretation of stealing food due to hunger in an unmarried woman’s dream shows that she is trying and trying hard to reach the best. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is offering...

title: The interpretation of seeing wine without drinking it is based on the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing wine without drinking it according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen In dreams, the boundaries and laws of reality are violated and many wonderful details occur, but they are part of reality, such as seeing things that exist in reality and people you know in your real life. These details prompted many scholars to provide Interpretations of dreams, they link the meanings of things that appear in a dream to things that happen in a dream, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing wine without drinking it according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of dreams of seeing wine without drinking it, interpretation of Ibn Sirin, the great scholar and translator believes Ibn Sirin famously said that seeing wine in a dream carries many interpretations and connotations. Seeing wine in a dream indicates the appearance of sorrows and worries in the dreamer, and wine in a dream may indicate the acquisition of forbidden money, which will come to the dreamer without effort. Ibn Sirin says that whoever finds in his dream that he is drinking wine until he gets drunk and goes out of his mind, this is a sign that The dreamer will soon have a lot of money in his hands, but he does not distinguish himself by thanking God for providing it. . He has this money, but if the dreamer finds that he is drunk in a dream, even though he has never drank alcohol, then this dreamer will feel fear and anxiety, but this feeling will disappear very soon. And if the dreamer drank alcohol in his dream, this is evidence that he was eating in an inappropriate way. legitimate. Drinking alcohol can be considered a sign of increasing disagreements with many people and it can be a sign that the fortuneteller will break his covenant with some people or may become crazy and lose his memory. It could be a sign of the misfortune of death or the loss of a loved one, God forbid. Interpretation of dreams about seeing wine without drinking it Interpretation by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation largely agrees with the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, as Al-Nabulsi says that wine in a dream is considered completely repulsive, as it is a harbinger of sadness and suffering for the pioneer, Like vision. . Of wine, it indicates forbidden money, God forbid. Interpretation of dreams about seeing wine without drinking it. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen agrees with both Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi that seeing wine in a dream is a vision that does not bode well at all, as it is considered a sign of forbidden money that he may earn. The dreamer may be a sign of the dreamer. I will. Falling into many sins and disobedience. Interpretation of dreams to see wine without drinking it for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, and a man: Interpretation of dreams to see wine without drinking it for a single woman: If a girl sees wine in a dream and does not drink it, this may be a sign that she is distinguished by her bad reputation, or that she She learns of the decline of morals, which is not good at all, and she sees it. Wine without it. Drinking it in a dream may mean that this girl will fall into the evil of strife and disobedience. Interpretation of a dream about seeing wine without drinking it for a married woman: Seeing wine in a dream for a married woman indicates her bad reputation and may be evidence of her shortcomings in her parents’ rights and their lack of justice, and it may be any

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing regret in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams and visions of remorse in a dream. Regret is a feeling that comes to a person after doing a wrong thing, action, or word. When remorse comes in a dream, it shows his repentance for his sins, and it also indicates achieving goals. Regret in a dream for a married woman, a single woman, a pregnant woman, or a man. , absolute and the interpretation of the greatest scholars in the interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of dreams and visions of sadness in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of sadness by Ibn Sirin Some interpretation scholars mentioned many evidence and gossip about the interpretation of a dream of sadness in a dream, and we can now mention Ibn Sirin’s interpretation in the following points: If the dreamer feels remorse in If the dreamer sees in a dream someone who repented and died, this indicates that his will was not implemented by his family or that he needs To his sincerity to his soul. Seeing a repentant person in a dream indicates his desire to reconcile with the people with whom he quarrels. See also: Seeing a promise in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of sadness in a dream for a married womanInterpretation scholars have reported that dream interpretation of sadness in a dream for a married woman has many connotations and meanings that we will mention. In the following points: If a married woman sees regret in a dream, this indicates her desire to repent and be upright with God. If a married woman sees in her dream that she regrets the problems of her marriage, this means that she wants to keep her home and bear many responsibilities. If a married woman dreams that she She sleeps while cutting her hair, this means that she is wasting her time on useless things. If a married woman sees in her dream that her husband regrets something, this indicates stability in her life with her husband. See also: Entering the police academy in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about sadness in a dream for a woman Single woman: Interpretation of a dream about sadness in a dream for an unmarried woman has many repercussions and meanings that we can mention below: If a single woman dreams of regretting that, this indicates her fear of making an important decision in her life, such as marriage. If she sees an unmarried woman in her dream If she regretted it to the point of crying, it means that she will satisfy her desire for life and reach a great position. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she regrets a sin she committed, this means that she fears God in the affairs of her life. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she regrets getting married, This means that she has chosen an inappropriate life partner and she must be careful in choosing. See also: Backgrounds in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of sadness in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream of sadness in a dream about pregnancy has many clues that we can mention below: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she regrets Certain thing, it means that she does a lot of good deeds. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she regrets her marriage, this indicates an increase in problems and disagreements. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is very regretful and crying, this indicates that she will have...
